issues.message: [Stack trace information](1) flows to this location and may be exposed to an external user.

rule.name: py/stack-trace-exposure
rule.full_description: Leaking information about an exception, such as messages and stack traces, to an external user can expose implementation details that are useful to an attacker for developing a subsequent exploit.

issues.message: A Flask app appears to be run in debug mode. This may allow an attacker to run arbitrary code through the debugger.

rule.name: py/flask-debug
rule.short_description: Flask app is run in debug mode
rule.full_description: Running a Flask app in debug mode may allow an attacker to run arbitrary code through the Werkzeug debugger.
